name: word-citation-management
title: Manage citations in a Word document
shortDescription: Shows how to manage citations in a Word document.
longDescription: This sample shows how to manage citations in Word with an add-in. The add-in uses the insertEndnote API to list inserted citations at the end of the document.

thumbnails.alt: The citation management add-in task pane.

references.name: Manage citations in a Word document using your Word add-in
references.description: Create an add-in that manages citations in a Word document.
